title: Mobile-Based Digital Pedagogy and Mathematical Modeling Competency Enhancement Program for Medical Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical education experience, proficiency in using digital devices, and foundational understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, graphs, statistics).
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment utilizing personal mobile devices (BYOD), with content focused on immediate applicability in medical education settings. Particularly emphasizes mathematical approaches for analyzing patient data and predicting treatment outcomes

learning_goals: Enhance the competency to design educational content incorporating medical data analysis and mathematical modeling by 80% or more using a mobile learning platform.
Evaluate the ability to develop educational materials using digital teaching tools (e.g., interactive quizzes, virtual simulations, probability/statistics-based analysis tools).
Through project-based assessment, produce one or more mobile education modules applicable to real lecture environments (e.g., medical data visualization, equation-based simulations).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
